website_summaries.verdict: Merrell Chameleon 7 Limit Stretch has earned both praises and criticisms. It is hugely appreciated for being comfortable right out of the box. Its easy slip-on style and grip on a variety of surfaces were also noticed. Despite being a good-value shoe, it had fit issues and premature wear and tear. Potential buyers are advised to fit this model in a store before making a purchase to get the right size. Overall, this issue aside, this footwear has attributes that will be useful on the trail.
pros: A majority of wearers commended the Merrell Chameleon 7 Limit Stretch for bringing comfort
Several buyers considered this backpacking shoe a worthy investment
Numerous owners were charmed by the slip-on style of this offering from the Chameleon line
This footgear afforded a steady grip on different surfaces according to some hikers
A couple of people found it stylish
A limited number of buyers confirmed that this footwear was durable
cons: A considerable number of buyers said that the Chameleon 7 Limit Stretch didn’t fit well
A handful of hikers reported that this hiking shoe showed wear and tear just after a couple of outings

customer_reviews.title: Reordered in my regular size and they fit perfect. These are women's shoes so any product description ...
customer_reviews.text: The first pair of these I ordered based on the reviews saying this was a men's shoe and they were too small. Reordered in my regular size and they fit perfect. These are women's shoes so any product description snafu has been resolved. The shoes are comfortable and fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Tessiemae

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A bit bulky and fat in the toe box - but overall comfortable for every day wear and easy to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Tennyson

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Did not need a break in period. Comfortable right out of the box. Fit was true to size - I wear a women's 9.0 Medium in most athletic shoes. Elastic cinch lacing system is nice. Easy to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit! So comfortable and looks nice. It is awesome to not have to tye shoes, especially in a hiking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Ann Carter

customer_reviews.title: Like them better than I thought I would!
customer_reviews.text: Great support and better grip than Keens I have. Only disappointment was that they are tie laces instead of elastic lace system. However that was easily remedied by purchasing that and changing it out! Comfortable and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Snelson

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I need a stiff, supportive walking shoe and this works. I have arthritis in my big toes and high arches so having good arch support and firm base helps. But, I did put Super Feet inserts in the shoes to add more.
customer_reviews.author: CarolV

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the arch support and comfort. Havea drugged, well fit shoe slip on is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, long lasting and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots!! This is my second pair of these shoes. They are so comfortable the minute you put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Babs D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy walks!
customer_reviews.text: Good support for long walks. Somewhat hard to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Peggie W.

customer_reviews.title: Women's shoes were sent
customer_reviews.text: The listing states that the shoes are mens, yet women's were sent. I would like them, but they are too small (width/height). Length may be slightly small also.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Used these shoes for hiking in the redwoods! They were perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these shoes!! They didn’t even need to be broken in. I walked all over Israel in them and they were super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Marlie

customer_reviews.title: NOT MEN’S
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT men’s as the listing states. The listing states men’s but the product description states women’s dept. didn’t notice until after I ordered. 50/50 chance st that point. But no, they are women’s. Need to correct the product listing.
customer_reviews.author: N Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Says men’s, it’s womens
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a men’s 8.5 and received a women’s 8.5. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lake

customer_reviews.title: WOMEN Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I also received a women shoe. I ordered this and the title say Men shoe. Will be returning item
customer_reviews.author: Abiel V.

customer_reviews.title: Women's Shoe! NOT MEN'S. BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.text: WOMEN'S SHOE!!! The item was mislabeled when listed on Amazon. Item arrived clearly stating "Womens Chameleon". Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's Chameleon 7 Limit Stretch Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: This protective, easy on/easy off hiker features durable suede and breathable ventilation so you can push your limits, no matter the distance. FEATURES Pig suede leather and mesh upper Elastic cord and lock lacing system for quick secure fit Stretch collar for easy on and off Protective rubber toe cap Breathable mesh lining EVA removable footbed Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability EVA midsole for stability and comfort Molded nylon arch shank Flex Index Grade 2 M Select GRIP outsole tunes each outsole with durable traction that grips when and where you need it 4mm lug depth Weight: 2lbs 2 oz / 964g
